aria-allowed-role-1.title: Uses ARIA roles on incompatible elements
aria-allowed-role-1.description: Many HTML elements can only be assigned certain ARIA roles. Using ARIA roles where they are not allowed can interfere with the accessibility of the web page. [Learn more about ARIA roles](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/aria-allowed-role).

items.snippet: <label id="mw-sidebar-button" class="mw-checkbox-hack-button mw-ui-icon mw-ui-button mw-ui-quiet mw-ui-icon-ele…" for="mw-sidebar-checkbox" role="button" aria-controls="mw-panel" data-event-name="ui.sidebar" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
items.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  ARIA role button is not allowed for given element

color-contrast-2.title: Background and foreground colors do not have a sufficient contrast ratio.
color-contrast-2.description: Low-contrast text is difficult or impossible for many users to read. [Learn how to provide sufficient color contrast](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/color-contrast).

items.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 4.42 (foreground color: #4f4f4f, background color: #89c4fa, font size: 10.5pt (14px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

subItems.nodeLabel: These are genealogy links to Italy online databases and indexes that may includ…

frame-title-3.title: `<frame>` or `<iframe>` elements do not have a title
frame-title-3.description: Screen reader users rely on frame titles to describe the contents of frames. [Learn more about frame titles](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/frame-title).

items.snippet: <iframe id=":2.container" class="VIpgJd-ZVi9od-ORHb-OEVmcd skiptranslate" frameborder="0" src="#" style="visibility:visible">
items.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has no title attribute
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

target-size-4.title: Touch targets do not have sufficient size or spacing.
target-size-4.description: Touch targets with sufficient size and spacing help users who may have difficulty targeting small controls to activate the targets. [Learn more about touch targets](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/target-size).

items.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Target has insufficient size (52.1px by 16px, should be at least 24px by 24px)
  Target has insufficient space to its closest neighbors. Safe clickable space has a diameter of 23.8px instead of at least 24px.

Fix any of the following:
  Target has insufficient size (57.3px by 16px, should be at least 24px by 24px)
  Target has insufficient space to its closest neighbors. Safe clickable space has a diameter of 23.8px instead of at least 24px.

table-fake-caption-5.title: Tables do not use `<caption>` instead of cells with the `[colspan]` attribute to indicate a caption.
table-fake-caption-5.description: Screen readers have features to make navigating tables easier. Ensuring that tables use the actual caption element instead of cells with the `[colspan]` attribute may improve the experience for screen reader users. [Learn more about captions](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/table-fake-caption).

items.explanation:
Fix all of the following:
  The first child of the table should be a caption instead of a table cell
